name: ballast-electron
description: Single page web application for distribution within an electron shell

scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: npm run clean-dist && npm run copy-dist && node ./node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli
scripts.bundle-watch: npm run clean-dist && npm run copy-dist && node ./node_modules/webpack-cli/bin/cli --watch
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && npm run copy-lib && node ./node_modules/typescript/lib/tsc --build
scripts.compile-watch: npm run clean-lib && npm run copy-lib && node ./node_modules/typescript/lib/tsc --build --watch
scripts.copy-lib: npm run copy-lib:img && npm run copy-lib:js && npm run copy-lib:html && npm run copy-lib:css && npm run copy-lib:ballast-ui
